content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft a glowstone to craft a redstone lamp. To craft a glowstone, I need to place 4 glowstone_dust in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. I will start by moving one glowstone_dust from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now move the second glowstone_dust from slot 28 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now move the third glowstone_dust from slot 28 to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last glowstone_dust from slot 28 to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the glowstone, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a redstone lamp, I need to place a redstone below a glowstone in the crafting table. I will start by moving a redstone from slot 26 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I will move another redstone from slot 26 to slot 4, which is to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone_lamp
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 53, "index": 36}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I will move the glowstone from slot 11 to slot 5, which is above the redstone.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 6 with quantity 1
